entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
